teeport.teeport¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Teeport

The Teeport node class.
class teeport.teeport.Teeport(uri, name=None, parent=None, children=None)¶

Bases: anytree.NodeMixin

The Teeport node class.

Teeport node that connects to the Teeport backend service.

Parameters

  • uri (str) – The uri of the Teeport backend service. Usually looks like ‘ws://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:8080’ or ‘wss://some.domain/io’

  • name (str) – Name of this Teeport node

  • parent (obj) – The parent of this node. Use this to build a Teeport node network

  • children (list) – The children of this node. Use this to build a Teeport node network

Returns

A Teeport node instance

Return type

obj

link(self)¶

Connect to the backend service.

By default, a newly created Teeport node doesn’t automatically connect to the Teeport backend service. To connect manually, call this method.
